4003CFDE.Line5.144334: I'd venture out and retrieve these myself, but I'm more accustomed to dealing with the fully dead. Your discretion is appreciated of course, and you will be rewarded.

6780261C.Line3.144334: I require a host of intact ghoul hearts from the surrounding area. There's something special about the ravenous dead nearby - they can reanimate with only a few drops of blood.

8EFC7C5A.Line1.144334: I provide a steady supply of, shall we say, specimens... for the clergy nearby. However, their desire for knowledge has become more dangerous to satisfy.
